description: Module that allows users to report bad behavior to the Moderators of the server.

channel.description: Set the channel where the reports will be sent.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: Channel where you want the reports to be sent.

docs.description: Get the link of the reports module documentation.

view.description: View the settings of the reports module.

reset.description: Restores the module settings to the original ones (data can't be recovered).

confirmation.name: confirmation
confirmation.description: Are you really sure you want to reset the data for this module?
